posts.content:
Hi
New to the site and to be fair VW ownership so thought this would be a good place to start, although to be fair I have been in email contact with a couple of members re their vans.
So, I'm looking for a split screen camper - not a project - not molested mechanically (lowered/non-VW engined/other 'trick' additions). I don't mind a bit of work to get it to what I actually want (specifically interior), I guess something that can be used as is with a view to changing over time. Major bodywork is a no go as well.
I am also a 'bit fussy' about the colour too, so green (any shade) is a definite no-no, as is any 'natural patina'.
These are the things I would consider purchasing to make life a little more comfortable if not already fitted/coming with van - awning, hook-up, split charger, auxillary heating and a decent protective cover; I mention these as I have to include them in my overall budget.
Now to the crunch statement - I have a budget of Â£25,000 to hopefully set me an the missus up for our retirement cruises!
All help/advice/comments/suggestions/constructive criticism or leads to a suitable van greatly appreciated.
We're based in Essex so I need to take distance into consideration when planning viewings.
Thanks in anticipation

OOOps
Almost forgot - would like a LHD.
